data.title: Hotel La Residence & Idrokinesis
data.description: Surrounded by lush parks, this 4-star hotel is ideal for a relaxing stay in Abano Terme. It offers a variety of wellness, spa and rehabilitation programs, as well as free Thermal Spa Cards for guests....

data.title: Hotel Terme Venezia 4-star hotel
data.description: In the center of Abano Terme, just 6 miles from Padua, the Hotel Venezia features 2 thermal swimming pools and a spa.

data.title: Hotel Terme All'Alba 4-star hotel
data.description: Hotel Terme All'Alba features 2 swimming pools, a free gym and a free spa center.

data.title: Hotel Due Torri
data.description: The Hotel Due Torri provides an elegant setting for your stay in Abano Terme, overlooking Montirone Park. It has 3 thermal pools and a luxury spa center.

data.title: Hotel Terme Roma
data.description: The Hotel Terme Roma is in central Abano Terme, at the start of a traffic-free area near Piazza della Repubblica. It features a free thermal spa with 3 naturally heated pools and a gym.

data.title: Hotel Ariston Molino Terme
data.description: This stylish hotel is found in a picturesque, quiet location near the shopping district and spa gardens of Abano Terme.
